name: Savage Offroad
description: SAVAGE OFFROAD is a retro-inspired truck racing game set in a post apocalyptic future. It's part racing, part gladiatorial combat and ALL ACTION! Join a tribe of irradiated savages that FIGHT and RACE for the future!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 260 or ATI 4850 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
